item.title: 美国和中国在 COP28 会谈前就气候问题达成“谅解”——克里
item.description:
The United States and China have reached "understandings and agreements" on climate issues that will help ensure progress is made at the COP28 talks starting late this month in Dubai, U.S. climate envoy John Kerry said on Friday.翻译:美国气候特使约翰·克里周五表示，美国和中国已就气候问题达成“谅解和协议”，这将有助于确保本月末在迪拜举行的 COP28 会谈取得进展。

Kerry met with his Chinese counterpart Xie Zhenhua at Sunnylands, California, this week for four days of talks he described as tough and serious.翻译:克里本周在加利福尼亚州桑尼兰兹会见了中国外长解振华，进行了为期四天的会谈，他称会谈是艰难而严肃的。

"We had a few moments where, as in any negotiation, you think it's all despair," Kerry said at the Bloomberg New Economy Forum in Singapore. "We did come up with some very solid understandings and agreements which will help the COP and will also put us both in a place where we can help the world by focusing on more renewables and other kinds of things," he said.翻译:克里在新加坡举行的彭博新经济论坛上表示：“我们有过一些时刻，就像在任何谈判中一样，你会觉得一切都令人绝望。”他说：“我们确实达成了一些非常扎实的谅解和协议，这将有助于缔约方会议，也将使我们双方能够通过关注更多的可再生能源和其他事物来帮助世界。”

Common ground between the world's two top economies and biggest greenhouse gas emitters is considered a crucial part of any consensus at COP28, which is expected to focus on issues like climate finance and more ambitious energy transition goals.翻译:世界两大经济体和最大温室气体排放国之间的共同点被认为是 COP28 共识的重要组成部分，预计该会议将重点讨论气候融资和更雄心勃勃的能源转型目标等问题。

Kerry said details of the agreements between the two would be released soon.翻译:克里表示，两国协议的细节将很快公布。

One important agreement reached on climate loss and damage would allow any country to contribute to a fund to support the regions most vulnerable to climate impacts, Kerry said.翻译:克里表示，就气候损失和损害达成的一项重要协议将允许任何国家向基金捐款，以支持最容易受到气候影响的地区。

Much of the focus on China at COP28 will be on its ongoing programme to build more coal-fired power plants, and Beijing's reluctance to commit to a concrete target to cut fossil fuel use as it tries to guarantee energy security and economic growth.翻译:COP28 上对中国的关注主要集中在其正在进行的建设更多燃煤电厂的计划，以及北京方面在努力保证能源安全和经济增长的同时不愿承诺削减化石燃料使用的具体目标。

China envoy Xie told diplomats in September that phasing out fossil fuels was "unrealistic" while key technologies like energy storage remained immature.翻译:中国特使谢九月对外交官表示，逐步淘汰化石燃料是“不现实的” ，而储能等关键技术仍不成熟。

Kerry, when asked if he expected any compromise on coal from China, said: "You wait and see."翻译:当被问及是否预计中国会在煤炭问题上做出妥协时，克里表示：“你等着瞧吧。”

China now has 360 gigawatts of coal-fired power capacity in its project construction pipeline, he said, but "they're trying very hard to move away."翻译:他说，中国现在有360吉瓦的燃煤发电能力正在建设中，但“他们正在努力撤离”。

Right now, "it is irresponsible to be funding a coal-fired power plant anywhere in the world," he said.翻译:目前，“为世界任何地方的燃煤电厂提供资金都是不负责任的，”他说。

Reporting by David Stanway; Editing by Tom Hogue翻译:大卫·斯坦威报道；汤姆·霍格编辑
item.author: David Stanway

item.title: 独家：碧桂园计划年底前制定离岸债务重组计划
item.description:
China's embattled Country Garden (2007.HK) is aiming to pull together a tentative plan to restructure its offshore debt by the end of this year, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter said.翻译:两名直接了解情况的消息人士称，陷入困境的中国碧桂园(2007.HK)计划在今年年底前制定一项重组其离岸债务的暂定计划。

The nation's biggest private property developer, which missed a coupon payment in October triggering default terms, then aims to start formal negotiations with offshore bondholders by February or March next year.翻译:该国最大的私人房地产开发商在 10 月份未能支付息票，引发了违约条款，该开发商计划在明年 2 月或 3 月之前开始与离岸债券持有人进行正式谈判。

They added the firm expects to inform key bondholders of its cash flow projections by the year's end, as part of the basis for the tentative restructuring plan.翻译:他们补充说，该公司预计将在年底前向主要债券持有人通报其现金流预测，作为暂定重组计划基础的一部分。

The sources declined to be identified as the matter was confidential. Country Garden, which has almost $11 billion of offshore bonds, declined to comment.翻译:由于此事属于机密，消息人士拒绝透露姓名。拥有近 110 亿美元离岸债券的碧桂园拒绝置评。

The timeline for the company's debt restructuring plan has not been reported before.翻译:该公司债务重组计划的时间表此前尚未有报道。

Country Garden has been in the spotlight since August when its debt woes became public, rattling markets and forcing Beijing to roll out more support measures for the property sector.翻译:自8月份碧桂园债务问题公开以来一直备受关注，令市场不安，迫使北京推出更多房地产行业支持措施。

It has joined a long list of Chinese property developers that are either working on debt restructuring proposals or have presented them to creditors after having defaulted on offshore debt over the past two years.翻译:它加入了众多中国房地产开发商的行列，这些开发商要么正在制定债务重组方案，要么在过去两年发生海外债务违约后已向债权人提交了这些方案。

Reuters reported this week that Chinese authorities have asked domestic financial behemoth Ping An Insurance Group to take a controlling stake in Country Garden. That report was denied by Ping An.翻译:路透社本周报道称， 中国当局已要求国内金融巨头平安保险集团控股碧桂园。中国平安否认了这一报道。

A state-engineered rescue of Country Garden would be one of the most significant interventions to date by authorities to support the cash-squeezed and highly indebted property sector, which accounts for a quarter of China's economy.翻译:国家对碧桂园的救助将是迄今为止当局为支持现金紧张且负债累累的房地产行业而采取的最重大干预措施之一，该行业占中国经济的四分之一。

The two sources, who have no information on the bailout talks, said some Country Garden bondholders do not expect a higher recovery rate on their investments even if such a deal were to eventuate.

ADVISERS BEGIN DUE DILIGENCE

Offshore bondholders sought urgent talks with Country Garden after it did not pay the $15 million coupon on Oct.18 - the end of a 30-day grace period, sources with direct knowledge of the matter have said.翻译:据直接了解情况的消息人士称，碧桂园在 10 月 18 日（30 天宽限期结束）未支付 1500 万美元息票后，海外债券持有人寻求与碧桂园进行紧急谈判。

CreditSights said in a Nov. 2 research note that Country Garden had "formally defaulted" on its offshore bonds due to the missed payment.翻译:CreditSights 在 11 月 2 日的一份研究报告中表示，由于未能及时付款，碧桂园已对其离岸债券“正式违约”。

The company has been privately communicating with some bondholders about its efforts to formulate a debt repayment plan since then, the sources said.翻译:消息人士称，此后该公司一直在私下与一些债券持有人沟通，以制定债务偿还计划。

Country Garden said on Oct. 10 that it had appointed CICC, Houlihan Lokey, and law firm Sidley Austin as advisers to examine its capital structure and liquidity position and formulate a "holistic" solution to repay its offshore debt.翻译:碧桂园10月10日表示，已任命中金公司、Houlihan Lokey和盛德律师事务所为顾问，审查其资本结构和流动性状况，并制定偿还境外债务的“整体”解决方案。

CICC did not immediately respond to Reuters' queries. Houlihan and Sidley Austin declined to comment.翻译:中金公司没有立即回应路透社的询问。霍利汉和盛德拒绝置评。

The advisers have begun due diligence on Country Garden's financial condition, including looking at cash flow for onshore projects, said the two sources and a separate source familiar with the matter.翻译:两位消息人士和另一位知情人士表示，顾问已开始对碧桂园的财务状况进行尽职调查，包括研究陆上项目的现金流。

As yet, few Chinese property developers have reached agreements on debt repayment plans.翻译:迄今为止，很少有中国房地产开发商就债务偿还计划达成协议。

Sunac China Holdings Ltd (1918.HK) in October became the first to complete the debt revamp scheme for its $9 billion offshore debt after winning approval from creditors and courts.翻译:融创中国控股有限公司（1918.HK）在获得债权人和法院批准后，于10月成为首家完成90亿美元离岸债务债务重组计划的公司。

Bigger rival China Evergrande (3333.HK), however, saw its initial $23 billion offshore debt restructuring plan thrown off course in September after Chinese authorities launched an investigation into its billionaire founder Hui Ka Yan and a flagship unit.翻译:然而，更大的竞争对手中国恒大（3333.HK）在中国当局对其亿万富翁创始人许家印及其旗舰部门展开调查后，其最初的 230 亿美元海外债务重组计划于 9 月被搁置。

Reporting by Xie Yu; Additional reporting by Clare Jim; Editing by Sumeet Chatterjee and Edwina Gibbs翻译:谢宇报道；克莱尔·吉姆的补充报道；苏米特·查特吉和埃德温娜·吉布斯编辑
item.author: Yu Xie

item.title: 早在救援谈判之前，碧桂园就难以支付账单
item.description:
When China's largest developer Country Garden first skipped debt payments in August, its shares tumbled 14%, marking a reversal of fortunes: from industry poster child to another troubled property company struggling to pay its creditors.翻译:当中国最大的开发商碧桂园8月份首次跳过债务偿还时，其股价暴跌14%，标志着命运的逆转：从行业典范变成了另一家陷入困境、难以偿还债权人的房地产公司。

The same month, Chinese authorities quietly started talks with Ping An asking the insurance group to take a controlling stake in the developer, according to a Reuters report that was denied by Ping An.翻译:据路透社报道，同月，中国当局悄悄开始与平安进行谈判，要求该保险集团持有该开发商的控股权，但平安否认了这一报道。

Interviews with contractors, workers and home buyers, as well as a review of lawsuits involving Country Garden, show that for months before its problems became public, the company was struggling to deliver homes and pay contractors on time.翻译:对承包商、工人和购房者的采访以及对涉及碧桂园的诉讼的审查表明，在其问题公开之前的几个月里，该公司一直在努力按时交付房屋并向承包商付款。

Until the middle of this year, the company was seen by most investors and home buyers as a beacon of strength in a real estate sector grappling with ballooning debt, tighter regulations and slumping sales. It was one of the few developers able to issue state-guaranteed onshore bonds last year and get credit lines from banks in early 2023.翻译:直到今年年中，该公司还被大多数投资者和购房者视为房地产行业的力量灯塔，该行业正在努力应对债务膨胀、监管收紧和销售下滑​​的问题。它是去年能够发行国家担保的境内债券并在 2023 年初获得银行信贷额度的少数开发商之一。

China, the world's second-largest economy, has struggled to recover from COVID shutdowns and issues with its giant property sector. Country Garden's woes highlight the challenge Beijing faces as it seeks to engineer a rescue plan for the company and improve conditions for the wider industry.翻译:作为世界第二大经济体的中国一直在努力从新冠疫情导致的停工和庞大的房地产行业问题中恢复过来。碧桂园的困境突显了北京在寻求为该公司制定救援计划并改善更广泛行业的条件时所面临的挑战。

"Nobody believed that Country Garden would fail. One important reason is that it seemed to have the implicit guarantee from the state," the Economist Intelligence Unit's Xu Tianchen told Reuters.翻译:“没有人相信碧桂园会失败。一个重要原因是它似乎有国家的隐性担保，”经济学人智库的徐天辰告诉路透社。

Observers believed Country Garden, which has liabilities of around $190 billion and more than 3,000 projects under development, was "good enough and big enough to escape a default or a collapse," he added.翻译:他补充说，观察人士认为，碧桂园负债约 1,900 亿美元，有 3,000 多个正在开发的项目，“足够好、足够大，可以避免违约或倒闭”。

Examples of Country Garden's earlier financial strains, reported here for the first time, include: A valve supplier unpaid since 2022; a steel provider partially paid with apartments; homeowners and workers reporting projects stalled from as early as January; and a Country Garden subsidiary which told a court earlier this year it was "insolvent and overwhelmed."翻译:在此首次报道的碧桂园早期财务紧张的例子包括： 一家阀门供应商自 2022 年以来一直未付款；钢铁供应商部分支付公寓费用；房主和工人报告项目早在一月份就陷入停滞；碧桂园的一家子公司今年早些时候向法庭表示，该公司“资不抵债，不堪重负”。

Lawsuits involving Country Garden and its contractors, including disputes over delayed construction and missing payments, have jumped to a record 459 cases this year, according to data compiled by EIU’s Xu.翻译:根据 EIU 的 Xu 汇编的数据，今年涉及碧桂园及其承包商的诉讼，包括延迟施工和拖欠付款的纠纷，已跃升至创纪录的 459 起。

Country Garden declined to comment.翻译:碧桂园拒绝置评。

After its default, Country Garden has stressed that delivery of homes will remain its top priority, saying last week it had delivered around 460,000 units in the first 10 months of 2023.翻译:违约后，碧桂园强调交付房屋仍将是其首要任务，上周表示，该公司在 2023 年前 10 个月已交付约 46 万套住宅。

In July, only weeks before it skipped debt payments, Country Garden launched a campaign on its WeChat channel titled “Beautiful Delivery”, showcasing newly built apartments and happy homeowners. Some of the projects, it said, were even delivered ahead of schedule.

'FACING LOSSES'

While disputes and delays are par for the course for any large developer, and data in China is often incomplete, the court documents shed light on a contrast between the image Country Garden presented publicly and some of its challenges behind closed doors.翻译:尽管争议和延误对任何大型开发商来说都是司空见惯的事情，而且中国的数据往往不完整，但法庭文件揭示了碧桂园公开展示的形象与闭门造车面临的一些挑战之间的对比。

In a case over alleged delayed delivery of apartments in the central megacity Chongqing, the local Country Garden subsidiary told the court it owed 60 million yuan ($8.2 million) in project payments and "faced severe financial losses and was unable to cover its liabilities", according to a verdict handed down in June.翻译:在中央大城市重庆涉嫌延迟交付公寓的案件中，碧桂园当地子公司告诉法院，其欠下 6000 万元人民币（820 万美元）的工程款，并且“面临严重的财务损失，无法偿还债务”，根据六月份作出的判决。

It said it was, "insolvent and overwhelmed, and even if the court reduced the damages at its own discretion, it may still be hard for the defendant to fulfill its obligations in the future."翻译:其表示，“资不抵债，不堪重负，即使法院自行裁量减少损害赔偿，被告今后仍可能难以履行其义务。”

Other court cases feature similar examples from last year and early this year: They involve sums as small as 267,475 yuan in arrears for 50% of an elevator installation fee or 2.8 million yuan demanded by an electrical installation company.翻译:去年和今年年初的其他法院案件也有类似的例子：其中涉及拖欠电梯安装费50%的267,475元或电气安装公司索要的280万元。

Some large contractors decided to skip the court process altogether, according to a steel supplier based in south China. He told Reuters "the priority for us is to get our money back through negotiations instead of filing a lawsuit, which is very time-consuming and won’t necessarily yield a satisfactory result."翻译:据华南一家钢铁供应商称，一些大型承包商决定完全跳过法庭程序。他告诉路透社，“我们的首要任务是通过谈判拿回我们的钱，而不是提起诉讼，这非常耗时，而且不一定会产生令人满意的结果。”

Country Garden owed the supplier, who did not want to be identified due to the sensitivity of the situation, an equivalent of several million dollars for reinforced steel bars.翻译:碧桂园欠该供应商相当于数百万美元的钢筋，由于情况敏感，该供应商不愿透露姓名。

He was promised half of the owed amount in unfinished apartments. The other half was to be paid in cash, but the supplier has so far only received a quarter of the payment.翻译:他得到了半数未完工公寓欠款的承诺。另一半则以现金支付，但供应商迄今为止只收到了四分之一的货款。

"The situation deteriorated from the second half of 2022, and it’s become even worse from the start of this year, when the payment to us was delayed,” said the supplier.翻译:该供应商表示：“从2022年下半年开始，情况就开始恶化，从今年年初开始，情况变得更糟，我们的付款被推迟了。”

The impact of Country Garden’s cash crunch has reverberated even after the missed August payments.翻译:即使在八月份未能付款之后，碧桂园现金紧缩的影响仍然产生了影响。

A week after that, contractor Qiao Jingjing, said his construction site in Xinzheng, a city of 1.2 million in Henan Province, also stalled.翻译:一周后，承包商乔晶晶表示，他位于河南省新郑市（拥有 120 万人口的城市）的建筑工地也陷入停滞。

Qiao, 38, was left with 20,000 yuan in unpaid wages for two months of his work. He said his company, Jujiang Group, which was a subcontractor at the site installing aluminum sheets, is owed more than 770,000 yuan.翻译:38岁的乔被拖欠了两个月的工资2万元。他说，他的公司钜江集团是现场安装铝板的分包商，欠债超过77万元。

Country Garden did not respond to questions about the payment or delivery disputes.翻译:碧桂园没有回应有关付款或交货纠纷的问题。

Qiao said apartment buyers and construction workers kept coming to Country Garden offices seeking information.翻译:乔说，公寓买家和建筑工人不断来到碧桂园办公室寻求信息。

"But Country Garden's sales staff have never given us any reply to these questions: When will the construction resume? When can the property be handed over to the owners? When will the workers get their wages?”翻译:“但碧桂园的销售人员从来没有给我们任何答复：什么时候恢复施工？什么时候可以把房产交给业主？工人什么时候可以拿到工资？”
